name: feed me in spoonfuls
description:
feed me in spoonfuls

created by Jules De Guzman

of all the colors in the spectrum, 

blue is an appetite suppressant

________________________________________________________

There are choices to be made.

continuously.

This is poetry in an experimental form.

Pls tread lightly when played. (It is in progress)
